key.name: auto-keyboard-backlight
key.description: When enabled, the extension will automatically control the keyboard backlight based on ambient light conditions. The keyboard backlight will be enabled in low light conditions and disabled in brighter environments.

key.name: keyboard-idle-timeout
key.description: Time in seconds of user inactivity before the keyboard backlight is turned off to save power. The backlight will automatically turn back on when user activity is detected in low light conditions.
